scripts.test: for t in build full-build rollup; do ( cd test/$t && rollup -c && cat preamble.html ../tests.html > test.html && open test.html); done
scripts.prepublish: rollup -c && rollup -c rollup-full.config.js && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs -m -o popup.min.js popup.js && uglifyjs -m -o popup-full.min.js popup-full.js
